description:
Comprehensive information related to MANGO in the palm of your hand in an elegant and easy to use application. 

NOVELTIES AND PROMOTIONS 
- Keep up to date with the novelties of the new collections. 
- Take a peek at the catalogues before anybody else and discover the latest trends. 

E-SHOP 
- The application includes a virtual store assortment where you can purchase any product quickly, simply and safely. 

MANY MORE FEATURES 
- Find out where your nearest store is. 
- Read our trends blog Keep The Beat. 
- View all the collections and discover the prices and details of each garment. 


MANGO 
MANGO is an internationally famous fashion multinational which designs, manufactures and markets women’s and men’s clothing and accessories. 

Dressing the modern, urban women for her daily needs is the formula we have analysed, adapted and applied in all the countries in which we are present, over 90 countries and 1,200 stores. 

The key to our commercial success and international prestige arises from the interrelation between a quality product with an original design and a coherent and unified brand image.
